title: Sheriff
description:
- Be the last man standing at all costs!
- Defeat the Outlaws and the Renegade.
- Reveal your role.
- Start at 60 life.
- You start your turn first.

title: Deputy
description:
- Assist the Sheriff!
- Defeat the Outlaws and the Renegade.
- You win as long as the sheriff is the last man standing.

title: Renegade
description:
- You're the wildcard! Use your wit...
- Before defeating the Sheriff, you must defeat the Outlaws first.

title: Outlaw: Red
description: - Work with the other Outlaw to defeat the Sheriff as soon as possible!

title: Outlaw: Black
description: - Work with the other Outlaw to defeat the Sheriff as soon as possible!
